title: Strange fits of passion
creator_credit: Elise McCredie, Lucy MacLaren, Meridian Films, Film Victoria, Arena and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: This is the bittersweet story of a young woman’s journey to discovering the meaning of love, sex and desire in a post modern world. Obsessed with falling in love and losing her virginity, the protagonist is irresistibly drawn to the enigmatic Francis, who she meets working in a second-hand bookshop. She embarks on a compulsive journey to find him which sees her through a series of hilarious sexual and social misadventures. Cast includes: Michela Noonan, Mitchell Butel, Samuel Johnson, Steve Adams and Anni Finsterer.
